hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo '[Context-Aware Plugin] Hook triggered'
echo '[Context-Aware Plugin] CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT='"$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT"
echo '[Context-Aware Plugin] Reading stdin...'
cat > /tmp/claude-hook-input.json
echo '[Context-Aware Plugin] Input saved to /tmp/claude-hook-input.json'
cat /tmp/claude-hook-input.json
cat /tmp/claude-hook-input.json | node "$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT/dist/hooks/session-start.js"
exit 0
